title: Not getting key fragment
body:
I dont know whats going on, but i haven't got key fragments in ages. i play with 5 man pre-made (with champ that i own) and won the game and yet still did't get any key. I even tried playing aram with friends and won (with champ that i own), yet won't get any. 

someone pls help and riot pls notice this.

replies.body:
Key fragments aren't determined by the number of players on your team, and will just drop on its own.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, your rate of fragments dropping slow down the more you receive them until it refreshes again in about ~28 days.  You got a huge load of key fragments in the first and second weeks of January, so refresh will come.  Hang tight!

Edit:  Key fragments do drop on its own but the chances will improve when playing with friends too.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=z8O8stoU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-01T19:44:10.634+0000)
>
> Key fragments aren't determined by the number of players on your team, and will just drop on its own.

The hextech crafting guide says "Key fragments drop a little more frequently when you play with friends!"
My bad!  It does improve chances of dropping fragments.  Thanks for pointing that out. :D
